<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Golem Grafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1227) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Golem Grafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=39)

**Prerequisites**
expert in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) and [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), or an ally with expert proficiency in those skills willing to augment you

</column>

---

Your flesh has been specially treated with the same arcane and alchemical processes used to toughen the skin of [flesh golems](/Monsters.aspx?ID=238). Increase your maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your number of class feats from the golem grafter archetype.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the golem grafter archetype.

<title level="2">Golem Grafter Dedication leads to...</title>
[Accursed Clay Fist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1228), [Iron Lung](/Feats.aspx?ID=1231), [Legs of Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=1230), [Quicken Heartbeat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1229)
